subdisciplines.name: Real Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The branch of mathematical analysis that deals with functions of real variables.

subdisciplines.name: Complex Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The branch of mathematical analysis that investigates functions of complex numbers.

subdisciplines.name: Functional Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The branch of mathematical analysis that deals with the study of vector spaces and continuous linear operators.

subdisciplines.name: Harmonic Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The branch of mathematical analysis concerned with the representation of functions or signals as the superposition of basic waves.
